title: Spider-Verse 4K Collector's Edition Drops To Best Price Yet In Amazon's Black Friday Sale
description: Spider-Man fans can save big on the awesome Spider-Verse 2-Movie Collector's Edition at Amazon for Black Friday. Originally released last year for $120, Amazon's discount drops the price more than 50%, all the way down to $53. With this deal, you're getting the 4K Collector's Edition for only seven bucks more than the Amazon-exclusive combo pack without the extras. This box set comes with 4K Blu-ray, 1080p Blu-ray, and digital editions of Into the Spider-Verse and Across the Spider-Verse, two of the best superhero and animated movies of all time. Get Spider-Verse Collector's Edition Spider-Verse 2-Movie Collector's Edition is just one of many great Blu-ray box set deals up for grabs in Amazon's Black Friday Sale. You can pair your new Spider-Verse collection with other Spider-Man box set deals, too. Sam Raimi's Spider-Man Trilogy starring Tobey Maguire is discounted to only $36 on 4K Blu-ray, and the three most recent Tom Holland-led live-action Spidey flicks are available in a 3-Movie Blu-ray collection for just $23. For more great offers, check out GameSpot's roundup of Blu-ray, TV, and anime deals at Amazon.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Amazon's Black Friday sale also includes Sam Raimi's Spider-Man Trilogy on 4K and the MCU's trilogy starring Tom Holland.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Spider-Man fans can save big on the awesome Spider-Verse 2-Movie Collector's Edition at Amazon for Black Friday. Originally released last year for $120, Amazon's discount drops the price more than 50%, all the way down to $53. With this deal, you're getting the 4K Collector's Edition for only seven bucks more than the Amazon-exclusive combo pack without the extras. This box set comes with 4K Blu-ray, 1080p Blu-ray, and digital editions of Into the Spider-Verse and Across the Spider-Verse, two of the best superhero and animated movies of all time.

Spider-Verse 2-Movie Collector's Edition is just one of many great Blu-ray box set deals up for grabs in Amazon's Black Friday Sale. You can pair your new Spider-Verse collection with other Spider-Man box set deals, too. Sam Raimi's Spider-Man Trilogy starring Tobey Maguire is discounted to only $36 on 4K Blu-ray, and the three most recent Tom Holland-led live-action Spidey flicks are available in a 3-Movie Blu-ray collection for just $23. For more great offers, check out GameSpot's roundup of Blu-ray, TV, and anime deals at Amazon.

  • Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (4K Blu-ray, Blu-ray, Digital)
  • Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse (4K Blu-ray, Blu-ray, Digital)
  • 4 Comic Book Art Cards
  • Miles Morales Replica Sketchbook
  • 7" Vinyl Record with two songs from the movies: "Calling" and "Am I Dreaming"
  • Limited Edition box with 3D visual effects
  • Fold-out, fully illustrated disc case

The Spider-Verse 2-Movie Collector's Edition comes in a very cool box with 3D art designed to mimic traveling through the multiverse. Inside the box, you'll find a fold-out, illustrated case featuring a collage of Spider-People from many different dimensions. The interior artwork depicts Miles and Gwen overlooking the city. You'll also get an exclusive replica of Miles' sketchbook from the movies and four comic book-style art cards. This box set is rounded out by a 7" vinyl record with two songs from Across the Spider-Verse's soundtrack: "Calling" by Metro Boomin, NAV, and Swae Lee, and "Am I Dreaming" by A$AP Rocky, Metro Boomin, and Roisee.

In addition to Spider-Man box sets on 4K and standard Blu-ray, Amazon has deals on individual movies in the Spider-Verse and latest live-action series. If you simply want to the Spider-Verse films and don't need any of the extras, 4K Blu-ray editions of the Spider-Verse movies are cheap: Into the Spider-Verse is available for $14, while Across the Spider-Verse is $11. Check out all of the best Spider-Man Black Friday Blu-ray deals below.

Spider-Man PS5 Games

  • Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales Ultimate Edition -- $40 ($70)
  • Marvel's Spider-Man 2 -- $40 ($70)

If you own a PS5, you can save big on Insomniac's superb Spider-Man games thanks to PlayStation's Black Friday Sale. Marvel's Spider-Man 2 is on sale for a new all-time low price of $40 (was $70) at Amazon and other retailers, while Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales Ultimate Edition is also available for $40. This bundle contains the remastered version of Insomniac's first Spider-Man game as well as Miles Morales, which bridges the gap between the two larger games.

Spider-Man Black Friday Blu-ray Deals

Spider-Verse:

  • Spider-verse 2-Movie Collector's Edition (4K) -- $53 ($120)
  • Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (4K) -- $14 ($31)
  • Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse (4K) -- $11 ($50)
  • Spider-Verse 2-Movie Amazon-Exclusive Edition (4K) -- $46

Tobey Maguire's Spider-Man:

  • Spider-Man: Sam Raimi Trilogy Box Set (4K) -- $36 ($76)

Tom Holland's Spider-Man:

  • Far from Home / Homecoming / No Way Home (Blu-ray) -- $23 ($56)
  • Homecoming (4K) -- $20 ($31)
  • Far From Home (4K) -- $13.25 ($31)
  • No Way Home (4K) -- $17.49 ($39)
  • No Way Home Steelbook Edition (4K) -- $30.79 ($56)
  • Far From Home / Homecoming (Blu-ray) -- $10 ($39)
  • No Way Home (Blu-ray) -- $16 ($27)

Andrew Garfield's Spider-Man:

  • The Amazing Spider-Man 1 + 2 (4K) -- $30 ($50)
  • The Amazing Spider-Man 1 + 2 (Blu-ray) -- $15.50 ($27)

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
